Name: Professional Drill Set
Short description: High-performance drill set with multiple accessories
Description: Our professional drill set includes a powerful 18V cordless drill, 2 rechargeable batteries, a charger, and 30+ drill bits. Perfect for both DIY enthusiasts and professionals.

Name: Circular Saw Pro
Short description: Heavy-duty circular saw for precision cutting
Description: The Circular Saw Pro features a 1500W motor for smooth and accurate cutting through various materials. Includes laser guide, dust blower, and adjustable cutting depth.

Name: Premium Screwdriver Set
Description: This premium set includes 12 screwdrivers with various head types and sizes. Ergonomic handles provide comfort and maximum torque for all your fastening needs.

Name: Professional Wrench Set
Short description: Complete wrench set for mechanical work
Description: Our professional wrench set includes 15 different sizes covering metric and imperial measurements. Made from high-quality chrome vanadium steel for durability and strength.

Name: Safety Helmet Pro
Description: The Safety Helmet Pro exceeds industry standards with its durable ABS shell and comfortable 4-point suspension. Adjustable sizing ensures a perfect fit for all-day wear.

Name: Heavy Duty Work Gloves
Description: These heavy-duty work gloves feature a cut-resistant outer layer and comfortable interior lining. Perfect for construction, mechanical work, and handling sharp materials.

Name: Digital Laser Measure
Description: This digital laser measure provides accurate readings up to 100m with 1mm precision. Features area and volume calculation, Pythagoras function, and memory storage for 20 measurements.

Name: Professional Spirit Level
Description: Our professional spirit level features 3 vials for horizontal, vertical, and 45Â° measurements. The machined aluminum frame ensures durability and long-term accuracy.

Name: Variable Speed Rotary Tool
Short description: Versatile rotary tool with adjustable speeds
Description: This multi-purpose rotary tool comes with 50 accessories for cutting, grinding, sanding, and polishing. Variable speed control allows for precision work on various materials.

Name: Variable Speed Rotary Tool - 12V
Description: 12V model of our versatile rotary tool with 50 accessories for cutting, grinding, sanding, and polishing.

Name: Variable Speed Rotary Tool - 18V
Description: More powerful 18V model of our versatile rotary tool with 50 accessories for cutting, grinding, sanding, and polishing.
